item.title: [PI] Autocasting Ancients
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Jay Sir Jay
item.description:
@Sir_Jay wrote:

if (c.playerMagicBook == 1) { if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 4676) { c.setSidebarInterface(0, 12050); c.setSidebarInterface(0, 1689); } else { c.sendMessage("You can't autocast ancients without an ancient staff."); }

I.M.O I think you need to change the c.setSidebarInterface(0, 1689); or check that they are correct because further down the code it changes for normal autocasting and I have no idea why

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Autocasting Ancients
item.dc:creator: @Football1smylife Football1smylife
item.description:
@Football1smylife wrote:

I updated it for you and it still does not work… case 1093: case 1094: case 1097: if (c.autocastId > 0) { c.getPA().resetAutocast(); } else { if (c.playerMagicBook == 1) { if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 4676) { c.setSidebarInterface(0, 12050); c.setSidebarInterface(0, 1689); } else { c.sendMessage("You can't autocast ancients without an ancient staff."); } } else if (c.playerMagicBook == 0) { if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 4676) { c.setSidebarInterface(0, 12050); } else { c.setSidebarInterface(0, 1829); } } } break;

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Autocasting Ancients
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Jay Sir Jay
item.description:
@Sir_Jay wrote:

if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 4170 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 4676 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 15001) {

Correct me if i’m wrong but does this say you need item 4170 equipped AND item 4676 AND 15001 or else i’m printing c.sendMessage("You can't autocast ancients without an ancient staff.");

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Autocasting Ancients
item.dc:creator: @Football1smylife Football1smylife
item.description:
@Football1smylife wrote:

Here is my code for autocasting case 1093: case 1094: case 1097: if (c.autocastId > 0) { c.getPA().resetAutocast(); } else { if (c.playerMagicBook == 1) { if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 4676) { c.setSidebarInterface(0, 12050); c.setSidebarInterface(0, 1689); } else { c.sendMessage("You can't autocast ancients without an ancient staff."); } } else if (c.playerMagicBook == 0) { if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 4676) { c.setSidebarInterface(0, 12050); } else { c.setSidebarInterface(0, 1829); } } } break;.

Here is the problem: .

I click on autocast, it says that it can’t be casted without an ancient staff yet I am wearing one. It shows that I am autocasting, but I never got to select a spell. THIS DOES WORK IN NORMAL MAGE, BUT NOT ANCIENTS. CAN YOU PLEASE HELP ME MAKE IT SO YOU CAN USE ANY STAFF AND IT WILL AUTOCAST IN ANCIENTS?

Read full topic
